titleStmt.title: An elegy upon that renowned hero and cavalier, the Lord Capel, who (for his loyalty) was barbarously murther'd in the Palace-Yard at Westminster, on the [blank] day of [blank] 16[blank] / Preserved by a loyal person; and never before printed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills, Jun. for W. Davis,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "So have I seen a frolick bridegroom come ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
